content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(1.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0) with burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, -56.0) with burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)

### Iron Plate Production Line at position(2.0, 1.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at (1.0, 1.0)
- Stone furnace at (3.0, 1.0)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, 3.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (1.5, 2.5)
- Wooden chest at (3.5, 3.5)
- Burner inserter at (3.5, 2.5)
- Burner inserter at (5.5, 2.5)
- Wooden chest at (5.5, 3.5)

### Secondary Smelting Line at position(3.0, 7.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at (2.0, 7.0)
- Stone furnace at (4.0, 7.0)
- Burner inserter at (3.5, 9.5)
- Burner inserter at (2.5, 8.5)
- Wooden chest at (2.5, 9.5)
- Burner inserter at (4.5, 8.5)
- Wooden chest at (4.5, 9.5)

### Assembly Line Complex at position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Wooden chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at (14.5, 12.5)
- Wooden chest at (11.5, 14.5) containing copper cables
- Burner inserter at (12.5, 14.5)
- Wooden chest at (17.5, 14.5)
- Burner inserter at (16.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production at position(21.5, 15.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Burner inserter at (19.5, 15.5)
- Burner inserter at (23.5, 15.5)
- Wooden chest at (24.5, 15.5) containing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System at position(37.5, 19.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Boiler at (37.5, 19.0)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 34.5)
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 36.5)

Multiple belt groups and pipe networks connect these structures together for material transport.

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Wait for items to be produced before attempting to extract them from furnaces or machines
- Check if the target entity actually contains the desired item before extraction
- Implement proper waiting mechanisms when items are being processed

### Entity status monitoring needed
- Multiple entities show "NO_FUEL", "NO_INGREDIENTS", or "NO_POWER" status
- Ensure proper fuel supply to burner entities
- Set up proper material input chains before expecting output
- Connect power poles to provide electricity to machines requiring power

### Space management issues
- Some inserters show "output blocked" or "waiting for space" status
- Ensure proper clearance and valid destination entities for inserter outputs
- Design layouts with sufficient space between components
